Description: FRagment of oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip. Circular stamp with rose symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '173'. Name Kleisimbrotidas. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0669,09.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (119)
